Package business

Class AdventureManager

java.lang.Object
business.AdventureManager
public class AdventureManager extends Object
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an adventureAdventure.

    • checkAdventureFile

      public boolean checkAdventureFile()
      Method to check if the file storing the adventures can be accessed.
      Returns:
      true if is found, false if it is not.

    • isUniqueName

      public boolean isUniqueName(String name)
      Method to check if the name is unique between all the adventure Adventure names.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the name to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if it is unique, false if not.

    • createAdventure

      public void createAdventure(String name, int numEncounters, List<Encounter> encounters)
      Method to create an adventureAdventure and persist it.
      Parameters:
      name - string containing the name of the adventureAdventure.
      numEncounters - integer containing the number of encountersEncounter an adventure has Adventure.
      encounters - list of encounter Encounter instances the adventure Adventure has.

    • getAdventures

      public List<Adventure> getAdventures()
      Method to get all the adventures stored in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of adventure Adventure insatnces containing all the adventures of the system.

    • rollInitiative

      public String rollInitiative(List<CharacterGame> party, Adventure adventure, int currentEncounter)
      Method to calculate the initiatives of either monstersMonster and charactersCharacterGame and sort them in order.
      Parameters:
      party - list of characterCharacterGame instances containing the characters participating in the adventure Adventure.
      adventure - adventure Adventure object containing the adventure that is being played.
      currentEncounter - integer value containing the index of the encounter currently being played.
      Returns:
      a string contained the order in which each character CharacterGame and monsterMonster is going to attack.

    • combatStage

      public String combatStage(Encounter encounter, List<CharacterGame> party)
      Method with the logic involving the combat stage.
      Parameters:
      encounter - encounter Encounter object containing the encounter the party members CharacterGame are currently facing.
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances containing the characters playing the adventure.
      Returns:
      a string containing all the actions performed during the combat stage and its results.

    • restStage

      public String restStage(List<CharacterGame> party, Encounter encounter)
      Method with the logic involving the rest stage.
      Parameters:
      party - list of character CharacterGame instances containing the characters playing the adventure.
      encounter - encounter Encounter object containing the encounter the party members CharacterGame are currently facing.
      Returns:
      a string containing all the actions performed during the rest stage and its results.
